This Implementation Guide depends on the following standards and profiles:
Sharing Value Sets and Concept Maos (SVCM) FHIR Aware and FHIR Native case reporting systems should use SVCM to synchronize value sets used for reporting (e.g. disaggregators/stratifiers) and to specify concept maps between local code systems and required reporting value sets.
Mobile Care Services Discovery (mCSD) FHIR Aware and FHIR Native case reporting systems should use mCSD to synchorinze location data (e.g. health facility, site, community, distrct, region) use for reporting
Audit Trail and Node Authentication (ATNA) Used by the Case Report Transformer to provide patient information confidentiality, data integrity and user accountability.
Structured Data Capture (SDC) Under the FHIR-Aware option, a Case Report Transformer should use Definition Based Extract, defined in Structured Data Capture, to transform a incoming case report Questionnaire resource into a Composition resource before submitting to the Case Report Repository.
Data Analytics (forthcoming) Recommended Implementation Guide for providing a platform for business intelligence tools used for further data analysis and use of case report forms.
